name: Patterns !
description:
Goal

You have to replicate the patterns shown before the curtains are opened, by right clicking to change color and left clicking to change the current shape

Control

Left click to change the shapes , right click to change the color , or if you're on mobile : swipe to change color , click to change shapes.

Known issues

Audio latency is the biggest issue at the moment , but it occurs only in-browser, so if you want to experience the game with no latency , i suggest a download of the game.

Android version is not optimized yet , so the apk is a little too big (50MB) , it will be fixed soon , and it's not signed yet. Google play will certainly flag it as unsafe , i'd understand if you would'nt like to download it while it's not signed.
